doc.repnme: Transcript of one hundred seventieth special meeting of Executive Directors, held on Monday, December 1, 1958 : South Africa - Fifth Transport Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors held on Monday, December 1, 1958, covers only a proposed loan to the Union of South Africa for the Fifth Transport Project. The project represents the third time that the Bank and the New York market have collaborated on a joint operation to provide capital for the development of South Africa. The meeting focused on the details of the project as well as the economic position and prospects of South Africa. The Executive Directors resolved to approve the revised loan.
